00031 
00032 #ifndef EGS_SIMPLE_CONTAINER_
00033 #define EGS_SIMPLE_CONTAINER_
00034 
00035 #include "egs_functions.h"
00036 
00044 template <class T> class EGS_EXPORT EGS_SimpleContainer {
00045 
00046 public:
00047 
00048     EGS_SimpleContainer() : n_have(0), n_tot(0), n_start(4), n_max(1000000) {};
00049 
00050     EGS_SimpleContainer(int size) : n_have(0), n_tot(size), n_start(4),
00051                                     n_max(1000000) {
00052         if( n_tot > 0 ) array = new T [n_tot];
00053         else n_tot = 0;
00054     };
00055 
00056     ~EGS_SimpleContainer() { if( n_tot > 0 ) delete [] array; };
00057 
00058     void add(const T &t) {
00059         if( n_have >= n_tot ) grow();
00060         array[n_have++] = t;
00061     };
00062 
00063     void clear() { n_have = 0; };
00064 
00065     T &operator[](int j) { return array[j]; };
00066 
00067     const T &operator[](int j) const { return array[j]; };
00068 
00069     void  setNmax(int Nmax) {
00070         if( Nmax > n_tot ) { n_max = Nmax; }
00071     };
00072 
00073     T &pop() { return array[--n_have]; }
00074 
00075     unsigned int size() const { return n_have; };
00076 
00077     unsigned int maxSize() const { return n_tot; };
00078 
00079     unsigned int maxAllowedSize() const { return n_max; };
00080 
00081 
00082 protected:
00083 
00084     void   grow() {
00085         if( n_tot > 0 ) {
00086             int nnew = 2*n_tot;
00087             if( nnew > n_max ) {
00088                 nnew = n_max;
00089                 if( nnew <= n_tot ) egsFatal("EGS_SimpleContainer::grow(): "
00090                       "reached maximum allowed size of %d\n",n_max);
00091             }
00092             T *tmp = new T [nnew];
00093             for(int j=0; j<n_have; j++) tmp[j] = array[j];
00094             delete [] array; array = tmp; n_tot = nnew;
00095         }
00096         else { array = new T [n_start]; n_tot = n_start; }
00097     };
00098 
00099     int    n_have;
00100     int    n_tot;
00101     int    n_start;
00102     int    n_max;
00103     T     *array;
00104 
00105 };
00106 
00107 #endif
